Single Combat Assault.name: Single Combat Assault
Single Combat Assault.flavor: You challenge your foe to combat, riveting its attention on you.
Single Combat Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, the target is dazed until the end of your next turn, and if the target is within 5 squares of you, you pull it adjacent to you.

Disperse the Horde.name: Disperse the Horde
Disperse the Horde.flavor: Focusing on your true opponent, you push away the insignificant foes surrounding you and clear a path to your prey.
Disperse the Horde.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Disperse the Horde.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is your quarry, the attack deals 2[W] extra damage. Otherwise, you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Disperse the Horde.onMiss: Half damage, or 2[W] + Strength modifier damage if the target is your quarry.

Escape the Trap.name: Escape the Trap
Escape the Trap.flavor: You outmaneuver your foes, slipping past their defenses.
Escape the Trap.requirement: You must be adjacent to two enemies.
